headline: Needham upgrades AppLovin, sees stronger e-commerce growth and ‘potential upside’
summary: Investing.com -- AppLovin was upgraded to Buy at Needham & Company on Monday, with analysts citing growing confidence in the company’s e-commerce trajectory for 2026 as the stock trades well below last month’s highs.
